summary: This mod is great for necromancer characters, but not only. You can always summon a Restless Draugr to fight for you if you have low health or for other reasons. This Restless Draugr is great as a distraction and also fights pretty well.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#b6b6b6]Greetings, fellow Skyrim lovers! [/color]

[/size][size=3]I have made this mod to give you the possibility to conjure restless draugrs to fight for you. This mod is ideal for conjurers (necromancers) but not only.

[/size][color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Why?[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]It all started with my first mod from this series,[color=#00ffff] [/color][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60761/?][size=3][b][u][color=#00ffff]Summon undead - Conjure Skeleton Spell[/color] [/u][/b][/size][/url][size=3].[/size]
[size=3]I thought about continuing the series to provide you mods that are great for players who want to be necromancers in game.
[/size]
[size=4][b][color=#ffff00]Where do I find the spell tome?[/color]

[/b][/size][size=3]You can find the spell tome either at the [u][color=#00ff00]Vilemyr Inn in Ivarstead[/color][/u] in the room right to the counter, the room which you can rent. The spell tome at the Vilemyr Inn can be taken for free.
[/size][size=4]At merchants:
[color=#f9cb9c]Farengar - Whiterun (Dragonsreach)
Sybille Stentor - Solitude (Blue Palace)
Wylandriah - Riften (Mistveil Keep)
Phinis Gestor - Winterhold (College Of Winterhold)
Calcelmo - Markarth (Understone Keep)
Wuunferth - Windhelm (Palace Of The Kings)
[/color][/size]
[size=4][color=#ffff00]Are there any problems with this mod I should think about?[/color]

[/size][size=3]As far as I know, you shouldn't have any problems with it. If you find any problems leave me a message or a comment on this mod. [/size]

[color=#93c47d][size=5][b]There are few pictures of this mod. If you would like to share your experience with this spell, you can upload images for this mod as well.[/b][/size][/color]


[color=#ff0000][size=5]Also check out:[/size][/color]
[size=4][u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61247/?]Daughters Of Dibella[/url][/u][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60433/?]
[/url][size=5][color=#d5a6bd]Enjoy! ☺[/color]
[/size]

[i][size=3]jodidovahkiin[/size][/i]
author: jodidovahkiin
